column4:
People who want AI to take over the world

(and are silent about whether they accept
 human extinction as a result)
Jurgen Schmidhuber\nDirector of Swiss AI lab IDSIA for 25 years
Schmidhuber - AI goals are not human goals

Schmidhuber is silent on whether
he supports human extinction as a result

This is likely intentional

Schmidhuber ideology has influenced DeepMind

Schmidhuber was director of Swiss AI lab IDSIA for 25 years
Sepp Hochreiter invented LSTM along with Schmidhuber
Marcus Hutter invented AIXI @ IDSIA
Shane Legg completed PhD thesis under Marcus Hutter @ IDSIA

Shane Legg became Co-founder @ DeepMind
Sepp Hochreiter hired as 1st employee @ DeepMind
Marcus Hutter hired as senior researcher @ DeepMind
Richard Sutton\nInventor of Reinforcement Learning\nDiscovered "Bitter Lesson"
Sutton is silent on whether\nthis "inevitable succession" means\nhe supports human extinction
Sutton - No one should control or regulate AI
We should not insist our "AI successors"\ncare about us or our values
